DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether it is possible to improve the care of general practitioners for patients with heart failure. The investigators try to reach that goal by training the GP's for 90 minutes in uptitrating the recommended medication according the guidelines. After 6 month the investigators ask the patients to fill out a questionary. The investigators ask them about their quality of live.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Improve the Treatment of Patients With Heart Failure by General Practitioners
DOC.criteria: Do have a general practitioners diagnosis heart failure mentioned twice in the electronical medical file. Incapacitated patients with a life expectancy of less than 2 months Seniles Patients who do not speak the Dutch language
DOC.keyword: Heart failure, general practitioner, medical therapy, quality of live
